body.name: KiddiKap- No Spill Silicone Bottle Top Spout 3 Pack Bundle (Red, Blue, Green) BPA Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 17 mins
features: SPILL PROOF: Transform any standard water bottle into a spill proof sippy cups for toddlers. This set comes with three 100% leak proof kaps that only let liquids out when its being sucked on. Never let travel spills happen again!

MADE FOR EVERYONE: 100% BPA free and Safe for everyone. From babies and toddlers to adults! Helps teach babies how to suck from water bottles and help transition into bigger cups! Durable enough for bites that can also be used as a relaxing teething toy.

FITS ALMOST ALL BOTTLES: Kiddikaps are able to fit any standard size (28mm) water bottles , soda bottles and even some beer bottles which makes them instantly spill proof. You can use these with reusable straws by sliding one into the top of the spout. Dentist Recommended.

PORTABLE AND DURABLE: lightweight and compact lets them fit in any diaper bag or even your pocket. Don't stress about lugging around a big sippy cup when you can attach this to a standard water bottle. Built to last through all your travel and adventures

EASY TO USE AND CLEAN: Simply push the cap into the bottle and until its a tight fit and open the top of the cap. Simply hand wash with warm water or place on the top rack of the dishwasher for an easy clean. Easy baby water bottle. Simply pinch the spout to get started with Kiddikap
body.description: KiddiKap is the nation's most popular spill-proof kids' drinking cap Your kids will want to drink more water The Kiddikaps kids water bottle attachment is a great way for parents to make sure their child always has access to their favorite beverage. This attaches securely to most standard size water bottles. Great for Travel It has never been easier to share your water bottles with your children while in the car, on airplanes or any other way you may travel. With the lid that is attached to the KiddiKap it wont spill even if dropped or squeezed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why KiddiKap? As loving and caring parents and grandparents, we understand the importance of finding practical solutions to everyday challenges. One such challenge we often face is dealing with the aftermath of milk and juice spills, which can cause unnecessary frustration and inconvenience. Whether it's in the car, on the couch, on clothes, or even on electronic devices, these spills have a knack for disrupting our peace and adding to our workload. Fortunately, we've discovered an incredible solution that has revolutionized the parenting world and made spills a thing of the past. Introducing KiddiKap, a remarkable product designed specifically to minimize the frustrations caused by liquid messes. With KiddiKap, spills are transformed into moments of fun and joy for both children and caretakers. Imagine a portable drink solution that not only keeps your little ones hydrated but also ensures they stay dry and mess-free while enjoying their favorite beverages. That's precisely what the KiddiKap offers. Its innovative design has taken the parenting world by storm, garnering praise and admiration from parents everywhere. Now, you can embark on trips and adventures with your children without the constant worry of spills and messes. The KiddiKap becomes an indispensable companion, ensuring that your child can participate in various activities and experiences, no matter where you are. Whether you're going camping amidst nature's beauty, relaxing on the sandy shores of a beach, or simply running errands and shopping, your little one will have a blast, spill-free! What's more, the KiddiKap is designed with your convenience in mind. Its lightweight and compact nature make it a breeze to carry along on your travels. It won't take up much space in your car or luggage, leaving you with more room for other essentials. Say goodbye to the frustration of spills and hello to the world of hassle-free parenting with KiddiKap. It's time to make every adventure, every outing, and every sip a delightful and mess-free experience for both you and your child. Embrace the innovative design and the joy it brings, and let the KiddiKap become an essential part of your parenting toolkit.

Kiddikap's spill-proof cap is clean & hygienic! perfect for playtime, daycare, sitters & more. Easy to use & clean! Stay hydrated wherever you are! Introducing the ultimate water bottle attachment designed for kids on the go! Say goodbye to messy spills and hello to hassle-free hydration. This amazing gadget is perfect for school, travel, summers, beach, carseat, airplane, backpacks, and any other adventure your little ones embark on. With its innovative design, our water bottle attachment securely fastens to any standard bottle, preventing spills and leaks. Its lightweight and compact size make it easy to carry and store in backpacks or while traveling in carseats or airplanes, so your kids can stay hydrated no matter where they go. Stay hydrated with this must-have accessory for every kid's water bottle. Stay Hygienic on-the-go with Kiddikap: The Spill-Proof Water Bottle Attachment with Cap Cover for Clean and Fresh Hydration! The Kiddikap water bottle attachment is not only spill-proof but also comes with a cap cover that provides an extra level of protection. With this unique design, you can rest assured that your child's drink won't spill or leak even if the bottle accidentally falls over. The cap cover also helps keep the drinking spout clean and hygienic, especially during outdoor activities. Whether your child is at school, on a trip, or simply playing outside, the Kiddikap is the perfect solution for hassle-free hydration. So give your child the gift of hydration with Kiddikap! Kiddikap: The Spill-Proof Water Bottle Attachment Perfect for Playtime, Daycare, Sitters & More! The Kiddikap water bottle attachment is the perfect solution for busy parents who want to ensure their child stays hydrated throughout the day. With its spill-proof design and cap cover, Kiddikap is ideal for playtime, daycare, babysitters, and any other situation where spills and messes are a concern. The Kiddikap is also easy to use and clean, making it a hassle-free addition to any child's routine. Simply attach it to a standard water bottle and you're good to go! Whether your child is at home or on the go, the Kiddikap is the perfect accessory for children hydration. Give your child the gift of easy and spill-proof hydration with Kiddikap! Transition to Water Bottles Made Easy with Kiddikap's Spill-Proof Design. Perfect for Babies and Toddlers! The Kiddikap water bottle attachment is the perfect tool for parents who want to transition their babies from bottles to water bottles. With its spill-proof design and cap cover, the Kiddikap makes the transition easy and mess-free. Simply attach the Kiddikap to your baby's favorite water bottle, and you're ready to go! The Kiddikap allows babies to drink independently while preventing spills and leaks. Plus, it's easy to use and clean, making it a hassle-free addition to your baby's routine. Whether you're at home or on the go, the Kiddikap is the perfect accessory for easy and spill-proof hydration. Give your baby the gift of independent and mess-free drinking with Kiddikap! Add this to your easter basket, or stocking stuffer

Perfect for playing and travel The KiddiKap is a new product designed to help parents and children with water bottles. The convenient solution will fit over any standard sized bottle, whether it is hard or soft plastic. Never worry about your kids losing all their drink at the park, traveling or during meal and play time. The KiddiKap will reduce your stress when your child wants to drink out of a water bottle on the go. Fits 95% of standard size water bottles Replace your sippy cups. The KiddiKap fits any standard size water bottles & protein drinks. This is your 20oz water and soda bottles. The grooves help keep liquid in the bottle when tipped or squeezed. Works with a straw, learn new skills As a parent, having your toddler learn new motor skills is an important part of their development. Inserting a straw into a cup or bottle is a great way to help your child gain control over their fingers and hands. With practice and patience, it can be an exciting milestone for both you and your toddler. Always ready for quick trips Add the Kiddikap to your kids travel essentials. Quickly put the Kiddikap on a bottle for travel while in the car, on the beach, or any other place where you need to keep the bottle upright.

baby essentials Perfect for mealtime, snack time, or anytime! The Kiddikap Cup can be used on any water bottle with no more spilling and messes Are you tired of your kids constantly spilling water, milk or their favorite juices? Do you worry about liquid messes in your car when you travel? Does your toddler ever want to use a water bottle but then spills it all over themselves? Keep spills to a minimum with the Kiddikap. Kiddikap attaches to any standard size water or soda bottle and instantly makes them spill proof but still drinkable. This makes any bottle a kid water bottle. Designed to be lightweight, compact, portable and safe for you and your kids. Your child can use the Kap and over again, it is dishwasher safe so you don't have to worry about hand washing. The patented lid lock prevents accidental spills when you're on the go. The leak tight seal helps prevent spills both inside and outside of the cup, making sure that your floors stay clean. We all know that kids want to act like grown ups. Let Kiddikap help them transition from a bottle to a toddler water bottle. Reduce the drama at your house from spilled messes on carpet and reduce the risk of a spill on a hard floor. Is your baby teething? Our BPA free silicone is safe for kids to bite and they also get a little reward when they bite and suck at the same time! It's the ideal transition cup for weaning a baby off the bottle. Please note, These are designed to be spill proof, some babies may have a harder time getting the liquids out at first but we know over time they can learn these skills and will love Kiddkap. Some straws may also stretch out the spout which prevents leaking. We always recommend using reusable straws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very helpful in preventing spills
reviews.reviewText: It’s very helpful to prevent spills and it’s easy to drink out of. I like the material and quality. It does make the bottle lack sturdiness because the bottle has less air in it. Like the Costco brand water bottles are very thin plastic and it shrivels easy with these caps on it. One time my son dropped the bottle and it did explode, the top flew off and water spilled. But you can lay the bottle on the couch and it won’t spill at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazingFits perfectly on water bottleNever spills no messes yay!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is non spill works as promised. The only thing is you need a sturdy bottle, the lightee plastic bottles make it difficult to insert the spout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids Love It!
reviews.reviewText: The KiddiKap No Spill Silicone Bottle Top Spout is a game changer in our household. As a mom, I appreciate that it comes in a pack of three with vibrant colors - red, blue, and green - making it easy for my kids to identify their own bottles.The silicone material is soft and easy on my little ones’ mouths, yet durable enough to withstand the rough and tumble of everyday use. The no-spill feature is a lifesaver, especially during those hectic morning rushes or car rides.What I love the most is that they are BPA free, which gives me peace of mind knowing that my children are not exposed to harmful chemicals.These bottle top spouts are simple to use and clean, making them a practical choice for busy moms like me. They have certainly made meal times less messy and more enjoyable for my family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The caps work as expected and fits tightly enough that my child cannot pull it off - at least not yet. It does require strong sucking action so we had to cut the nipple to make the hole bigger for my 2 year-old. Now he uses the cap to drink from the Poland Spring bottle in the car and when we are out. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a great purchase
reviews.reviewText: While I understand that these are made for children to use in drinks, I bought them for the whole family to use thinking they would make traveling around with a drink much nicer with less chance of spilling. What i found was that when the bottle would be turned up to drink out of the liquid would leak out around the rim and it was very difficult to drink out of the mouth piece. You literally have to lightly bite and suck the liquid out at the same time. Too dang hard to drink using these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great if you don't have a chewer
reviews.reviewText: I am a parent doing the unending dance of trying to find a water bottle solution for my kids. Something easy to clean, spill resistant, easy to drink from, and preferably easy to use. I know it is a lot to ask. But these bottle toppers cover almost all of those criteria. It is pretty easy to insert them in a standard water bottle. It is a little tougher with those thin water bottles from walmart but definitely doable. It is easy for the kids to drink from them and close the top back. Though, even when they don't close the top, the stoppers do a pretty good job of not spilling. When it is time to clean them they do great in the dish washer or in the sink with a little bottle brush. The one drawback that we have encountered... the littlest kid likes to chew on things. She winds up widening the slit at the top of the stopper and ruining the "seal." In the scheme of drawbacks, it is my own kids fault, but something that may affect you too. I LOVE that I can just throw the stopper in my bag and get a water bottle wherever I am and don't have to lug a whole bottle around. And having 3 colors lets me tell the kids bottle apart at home. If you re on the mythic toddler cup hunt please do consider these, even as just a travel part of your setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cap for Littles!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect cap. Doesn’t leak. Can turn any water bottle into a sport bottle. This has been a blessing for car rides and just when we are out in general. I always keep one in my bag so I never have to worry. Great product. I’ve purchased 3 times already.
Fits water bottle. My kid totally loved it (1.5 yr old) every mom needs this for their toddlers lol
They work excellent!! Love them. But the price is ridiculous!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not fit in all bottles
reviews.reviewText: I love the thought of these and I’m super mad they don’t work because they are convenient to have in the backpack or diaper bag for the times you forget the water bottle. Unfortunately they do not fit in all bottles, which caused leaks and an angry kid!
